issue.title: Problems stopping all processes associated with ignition

content.raw:
This happens just as much with competition.ign. At first, I thought it was due to the logging and/or dynamic loading, but since it happens with virtual\_stix.ign as well, this seems to not be the issue. I’m having this issue today with the command 

ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1\_SENSOR\_CONFIG\_4
content.html:
This happens just as much with competition.ign. At first, I thought it was due to the logging and/or dynamic loading, but since it happens with virtual_stix.ign as well, this seems to not be the issue. I’m having this issue today with the command

ign launch -v 4 competition.ign robotName1:=X1 robotConfig1:=X1_SENSOR_CONFIG_4
